object.name: Bolognese
object.description: spaghetti with minced meat, vegetables and tomato sauce Ingredients: • Onions, garlic, carrots, celery • Minced meat • Tomato sauce • Basil, oregano, salt, pepper, thyme • oil

object.name: Pancakes
object.description: sweet and fluffy pancakes Ingredients: • flour • milk • eggs • butter • sugar • salt

step.step_text: whisk egg whites
mix egg yolks with rest of ingredients
fold in whisked egg whites
cook on non-stick pan over medium heat until surface is somewhat dry, then turn over

step.step_text: stroll out pastry, lift into tin
